channel.title: formula 1 on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in formula 1 on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Mobile formula one site and application
item.description: Hey, I used up until last race the nice live-f1 application to see live timings in the linux terminal. But starting with the last race I couldn’t. But today I got great news. The official Formula 1 website just released a mobile version available at mobile.formula1.com and oh joy and happiness they also released a mobile application that will offer Live Timings on your mobile phone. To my biggest surprise, my symbian based Nokia E71 is supported.
